How do you bring coaches back
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance Archive (GameBoy Advance): Coaches/Coaching: How do you bring coaches back
By Zan the man on Wednesday, May 29, 2002 - 05:58 pm:

how do i bring my coach back?

By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, May 29, 2002 - 07:37 pm:

Take another monster into AGIMA, and register it to be a coach, then assign it to the drill of the monster you want back. Accept it and the old monster will now be your play monster.

By Zan the man on Wednesday, May 29, 2002 - 08:03 pm:

thanks a lot
